text: Dorsten (; Westphalian: Dössen) is a town in the district of Recklinghausen in North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. About 75,000 people live in Dorsten. == Twin towns – sister cities == Dorsten is twinned with: * Crawley, England, United Kingdom * Dormans, France * Ernée, France * Hainichen in Germany * Hod HaSharon, Israel * Newtownabbey, Northern Ireland, United Kingdom * Rybnik, Poland * Waslala, Nicaragua == References == == Other websites == * Official website of Dorsten Category:Recklinghausen (district)
title: Dorsten
